TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from developers already using our Ethereum transaction monitoring app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a game-changer for our DeFi project. We can easily track new transactions and integrate them into our platform seamlessly.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The real-time alerting for significant transactions has allowed us to act quickly on new opportunities in the Ethereum ecosystem.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Setup was a breeze, and the data ingestion process is incredibly efficient. A must-have for any Ethereum project.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Learn more about how our app helps you find new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you discover and track new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. With powerful filters and notifications, you'll never miss an important transfer.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We constantly monitor the Ethereum network and immediately detect when new transactions occur. Our algorithms analyze the transaction data and surface relevant transfers based on your configured filters.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can track transfers of Ether, ERC-20 tokens, NFTs, and any other assets or data embedded within Ethereum transactions. Set up custom alerts for specific wallet addresses, token types, amounts, and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. We never have access to your private keys or ability to move your funds. We simply scan the public blockchain data in a read-only manner to identify transfers you want to monitor.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We offer a free tier to get started as well as paid subscriptions with more advanced filtering, higher transfer limits, and premium support. Check our pricing page for the latest plans and options.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay updated on the latest Ethereum transactions with our real-time monitoring and notification system. Never miss a beat in the dynamic world of blockchain.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge real-time transaction monitoring feature. Get instant alerts for new Ethereum transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Tailor your transaction search with our powerful filtering capabilities. Narrow down results by address, value, gas price, and more to find exactly what you need.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Navigate through transaction data with ease using our clean and user-friendly interface. Quickly access essential details and insights at a glance.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Effortlessly integrate our Ethereum transaction monitoring tool into your existing workflows and applications through our robust API.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Never miss a beat with our highly configurable notification system. Set custom alerts based on your specific criteria and receive updates via email, SMS, or in-app notifications.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Rest assured that your data is safe with our enterprise-grade security measures and highly available infrastructure, ensuring maximum uptime and reliability.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction monitoring platform. Receive real-time alerts for the latest confirmed transactions, enabling you to react swiftly and seize opportunities.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Tracking App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to easily track and monitor new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. It provides a simple interface to view and analyze the latest confirmed transactions.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the app get transaction data?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We connect directly to Ethereum nodes to stream in new block and transaction data as it gets mined and added to the blockchain. This gives you access to transactions as soon as they are confirmed.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I filter or search transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, you can filter transactions by criteria like sender/receiver address, transaction value, gas used, and more. The app also has a search function to quickly find specific transactions.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a limit on how many transactions I can view?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: No, there is no artificial limit imposed by our app. You can view as many recent transactions as you need, going back through the entire blockchain history.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Instantly detect and track new Ethereum transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Set up custom filters to monitor specific types of transactions or wallet addresses, and receive alerts for events you care about.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Easily integrate our transaction monitoring API into your existing applications and workflows.
